lead_paragraph: ROSENTHAL--J. Robert, M.D. New York Eye and Ear Infirmary of Mount Sinai notes with sorrow the passing of our dear friend and colleague J. Robert Rosenthal, M.D., a dedicated member of our community for more than 55 years. A renowned cornea surgeon, Dr. Rosenthal was also the hospital's first Medical Director and went on to serve as Senior Vice President for Medical Affairs and Chief Medical Officer before stepping down in 2014. He was a champion of quality service, advanced research, and excellence in physician training. Dr. Rosenthal was the member of a distinguished family of pioneering ophthalmologists at New York Eye and Ear Infirmary. In 2013, he received the John Kearney Rodgers Physician of the Year Award for his commitment to the hospital. New York Eye and Ear Infirmary of Mount Sinai and the Mount Sinai Health System extend heartfelt condolences to his wife Gladys and the entire Rosenthal family. Peter W. May, Chairman, Boards of Trustees, Mount Sinai Health System Kenneth L. Davis, M.D., President and Chief Executive Officer, Mount Sinai Health System 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  ROSENTHAL, J. ROBERT, M.D. NEW YORK EYE AND EAR INFIRMARY OF MOUNT SINAI NOTES WITH SORROW THE PASSING OF OUR DEAR FRIEND AND COLLEAGUE J. ROBERT ROSENTHAL, M.D., A DEDICATED MEMBER OF OUR COMMUNITY FOR MORE THAN 55 YEARS. A RENOWNED CORNEA SURGEON, DR. ROSENTHAL WAS ALSO THE HOSPITAL'S FIRST MEDICAL DIRECTOR AND WENT ON TO SERVE AS SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT FOR MEDICAL AFFAIRS AND CHIEF MEDICAL OFFICER BEFORE STEPPING DOWN IN 2014. HE WAS A CHAMPION OF QUALITY SERVICE, ADVANCED RESEARCH, AND EXCELLENCE IN PHYSICIAN TRAINING. DR. ROSENTHAL WAS THE MEMBER OF A DISTINGUISHED FAMILY OF PIONEERING OPHTHALMOLOGISTS AT NEW YORK EYE AND EAR INFIRMARY. IN 2013, HE RECEIVED THE JOHN KEARNEY RODGERS PHYSICIAN OF THE YEAR AWARD FOR HIS COMMITMENT TO THE HOSPITAL. NEW YORK EYE AND EAR INFIRMARY OF MOUNT SINAI AND THE MOUNT SINAI HEALTH SYSTEM EXTEND HEARTFELT CONDOLENCES TO HIS WIFE GLADYS AND THE ENTIRE ROSENTHAL FAMILY. PETER W. MAY, CHAIRMAN, BOARDS OF TRUSTEES, MOUNT SINAI HEALTH SYSTEM KENNETH L. DAVIS, M.D., PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER, MOUNT SINAI HEALTH SYSTEM 1
